recipes.method: Place the sugar cube in an lowball glass and saturate it with bitters. Add a couple dashes of water. Muddle until dissolved. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add the bourbon. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange swath and a cocktail cherry.

Add an orange slice to a mixing glass followed by the demerara syrup, bitters and bourbon. Add ice to a lowball glass. Add ice to the mixing glass and briefly stir. Strain into the lowball glass. Express the oils of an orange swath over the cocktail. Garnish with the orange swath and cocktail cherry.
recipes.notes: Using demerara syrup rather than a sugar cube results in a more uniform cocktail.

recipes.method: Add the bourbon, maple syrup and bitters to a mixing glass with ice and stir. Pour into a lowball glass over a large ice cube. Express the oils of an orange swath and garnish.
Chill a cocktail glass. Add the rye, sweet vermouth and bitters to a mixing glass. Add ice and stir. Strain into the chilled glass. Garnish with a cocktail cherry.
recipes.notes: A 'perfect' Manhattan uses half sweet vermouth and half dry vermouth.

recipes.method: Add the gin, campari and sweet vermouth to a mixing glass. Add ice to a lowball glass. Add ice to the mixing glass and stir. Strain the cocktail into a lowball glass. Express the oils of an orange swath over the cocktail. Garnish with the orange swath.
Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into a nick & nora glass. Express the oils of an orange swath. Garnish and serve.
Add ice to a lowball glass. Add the campari, sweet vermouth to the lowball glass. Top off with soda water and briefly stir. Garnish with a lemon wheel.
Chill a nick & nora glass. Add the gin, lemon juice and raspberry syrup to a shaker. Add ice and shake. Strain into the chilled glass. Garnish with a raspberry.
Add all the ingredients to a shaking tin with ice and shake. Strain into a champagne coupe. Garnish and serve.

Chill a champagne coupe. Add the gin, maraschino, crème de violette and lemon juice to a mixing glass. Add ice and stir. Strain into the chilled glass. Express the oils of a lemon swath over the cocktail. Garnish with a cocktail cherry.
Add the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir. Pour into a champagne coupe. Garnish and serve.

Chill a cocktail glass. Add the light rum, dry vermouth, dry curaçao and grenadine and stir. Strain into the chilled glass. Express the oils of an orange swath over the cocktail. Garnish with the orange swath.
Add the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir. Pour into a champagne coupe. Express orange oils. Garnish and serve.
Add ice to a collins glass. Add the ginger beer followed by the dark rum. Garnish with a lime wheel.
recipes.notes: Use Gosling's Black Seal Rum and Barritt's Ginger Beer.

recipes.method: Chill a hurricane glass. Add the light rum, cream of coconut, coconut milk, pineapple juice to a shaker. Add crushed ice and blend using an immersion blender. Pour into the chilled glass. Garnish with pineapple fronds and a pineapple wedge.
Add the cream of coconut, pineapple juice, lime juice and aged rum to a shaker tin. Add ice and shake. Strain into a lowball glass. Add crushed ice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Add the sparkling wine to a champagne flute. Add the gin, lemon juice and simple syrup to a shaker. Add ice to the shaker and shake. Strain into champagne flute along the side of the glass. Garnish with a lemon spiral.
Add the gin, lemon juice and gomme syrup to a shaker tin. Add ice and shake. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with champagne and add the absinthe. Garnish with a lemon spiral.
Chill a stein glass. Add the vodka, light rum, gin, tequila, triple sec, lemon juice, demerara syrup. add ice and shake. Pour into the chilled glass. Top with cola. Garnish with a lemon wheel.
Add the vodka, cointreau, cranberry juice and lime juice to a shaker. Add ice and shake. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange swath.
Shake all the ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled champagne coupe. Garnish with a lime wheel. Garnish with a lime wheel.
recipes.notes: Popularized by Sex and the City television series.

recipes.method: Add the rye, dry vermouth, lemon juice, grenadine and orange bitters to a shaker. Add ice and shake. Strain into a nick & nora glass. Express orange oils over the cocktail. Garnish with an orange swath.
Add the gold rum, sweet vermouth, lime juice, grenadine and angostura bitters to a mixer. Add ice and shake. Strain into a chilled champagne coupe. Garnish with a lime spiral.
Add the bourbon, lemon juice and honey syrup to a shaker. Add a block of ice to a lowball glass. Add ice and shake. Strain into the lowball glass.
Add the tequila and lime juice to a highball glass. Add ice and salt. Top with grapefruit juice. Stir gently. Garnish with a lime slice.
Rim a collins glass with salt and fill with ice cubes. Add the tequila, lime juice and grapefruit juice before topping with club soda. Garnish with a lime wheel.
Build in a salt rimmed glass. Muddle 4 lime quarters and 2 grapefruit slices before adding the rest of the ingredients. Garnish with a mint sprif.

Add the mint leaves to a chilled collins glass and release the oils by agitating them with a barspoon. Add the light rum, demerara syrup and lime juice to a shaker with ice and shake. Fill the collins glass with ice cubes. Strain into the collins glass and top off with soda water. Garnish with a mint sprig.
Add the london dry gin, triple sec, lemon juice and simple syrup to a shaker. Add ice and shake. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass. Express the oils of a lemon swath over the cocktail.
Add the scotch and drambuie to a mixing glass. Add ice and stir. Add ice to a lowball glass. Strain into the lowball glass. Express lemon oils over the cocktail. Garnish with a lemon swath.

Add the old tom gin, sweet vermouth, maraschino and orange bitters to a mixing glass. Add ice and stir. Strain into a chilled champagne coupe. Express lemon oils over the cocktail. Garnish with a lemon swath.
Stir all the ingredients with ice. Strain into a nick & nora glass. Garnish with a lemon spiral.
Add the mint leaves, demerara syrup and bourbon to a shaker. Add ice cubes and shake. Strain into a chilled julep cup. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Add the mint leaves to a collins glass and press down gently with a bar spoon to release oils. Add the rum, demerara syrup and lime juice. Stir. Almost fill with crushed ice and swizzle. Top off with crushed ice. Add the angostura bitters. Garnish with a sprig of mint.
Add the rye, lemon juice, orange juice and grenadine to a shaker. Add ice cubes and shake. Strain into a chilled champagne coupe. Garnish with a orange slice quarter and a cocktail cherry.
Add the dry sherry, dry vermouth and bitters to a mixing glass. Pour into a chilled champagne coupe. Express orange oils over the cocktail. Garnish with an orange swath.

Add the london dry gin, dry vermouth, sweet vermouth, dry curaçao, orange juice and orange bitters to a shaker. Add ice cubes and shake. Strain into a chilled champagne coupe. Express orange oils over the cocktail. Garnish with an orange spiral.
Add the kahlúa to a shot glass. Layer in the Baileys Irish Cream followed by the cointreau. Light.
Add ice cubes to a hurricane glass. Add the vodka, lemonade and lime juice. Then add the blue curaçao. Garnish with a lemon wheel and cherry.

Add the pineapple juice and malibu rum to a mixing glass and stir. Add the blue curaçao and water to a separate mixing glass and stir. Add the grenadine to a hurricane glass before filling with ice. Add the pineapple juice and malibu. Add the blue curaçao cut by water. Garnish with a stir stick. Serve with a straw.
Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Add the vodka, peach liqueur, orange juice and cranberry juice. Garnish with an orange slice and maraschino cherry.

Add the light rum and blue curaçao to a mixing glass. Add the grenadine to a highball glass. Add ice blocks to the glass. Add the orange juice. Layer on the rum and blue curaçao mixture. Garnish with an orange slice half. Serve with a stra.

Add the tequila and orange juice to a shaker. Add ice cubes and shake. Add the grenadine to a collins glass and fill with ice. Strain into the collins glass. Gently stir. Garnish with an orange wedge.
Fill a lowball glass with ice. Add the vodka, blue curaçao and orange juice. Top with club soda. Stir.
Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the gin, blue curaçao and lime juice. Stir. Almost top with soda water. Gently add the grenadine. Garnish with a lemon wheel. Serve with a straw.
Fill a collins glass with ice. Add the vodka, orange juice and galliano. Stir. Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

Add the cream of coconut, pineapple juice, 15 ml of the lime juice and 60 ml of the light rum to a blender. Blend with 5 ice cubes and pour the cocktail into a glass and store in the freezer. Add the remaining lime juice, simple syrup, the remaining rum and the strawberry to a blender. Blend with 4 ice cubes. Hold a knife in the center of a hurricane glass and add the two cocktails on either side. Garnish with a cocktail umbrella. Serve with a cocktail straw.
Refrigerate the butterfly pea flower tea. Add the simple syrup, butterfly pea flower tea and navy strength gin to a shaker tin with ice. Shake. Strain into champagne coupe. Add citric acid solution.
recipes.notes: Make citric acid solution by combining 0.5 tsp citric acid and 90 ml water.

recipes.method: Fill a wine glass with ice. Add the campari, sweet vermouth and prosecco. Garnish with a orange slice half. Serve with a straw.
Fill a wine glass with ice. Add the aperol, prosecco and soda water. Garnish with an orange slice half.
Fill a copper mug with ice cubes. Add the vodka, ginger beer and lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish with a lime slice.
Build over cracked ice in a copper mug. Top with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wedge.
Add the light rum, maraschino, lime juice and grapefruit juice to a shaker. Add ice and shake. Strain into a cocktail glass.
Add the grapefruit juice, lime juice, maraschino and light rum to a shaker tin. Add ice and shake. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.
Add the london dry gin and dry vermouth to a mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Express lemon oil over the cocktail. Garnish with an olive.

Fill a mixing glass with ice. Add the dry vermouth and briefly stir to rinse the ice with the dry vermouth. Strain the vermouth off and discard. Add the london dry gin and stir. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon spiral.
Add the tequila, triple sec and lime juice to a shaker tin. Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass with a slat rim.
Shake the ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled margarita glass with a salt rim. Garnish with a lime wheel.
Add the gold rum, galliano, pineapple juice and lime juice to a shaker tin. Add ice and shake. Strain into a margarita glass. Top with prosecco.
Build in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.
Chill the champagne and orange juice before adding to a champagne flute. Stir. Garnish with an orange spiral.
Add the bourbon, sweet vermouth and campari in a mixing glass. Add ice and stir. Strain into a lowball glass with ice. Garnish with an orange swath.
Stir all the ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled champagne coupe. Express orange oils. Garnish with an orange swath and maraschino cherry.
Add the aged rum, lime juice, simple syrup, angostura bitters and mint leaves to a shaker tin. Add ice and shake. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Top with prosecco. Garnish with a mint sprig.
Add the bourbon, amaro nonino, aperol and lemon juice to a shaker tin. Add ice and shake. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Add the light rum, lime juice, simple syrup and saline solution to a shake tin. Add ice and shake. Strain into a chilled champagne coupe.
Add chilled london dry gin to a chilled collins glass. Tilt the glass and gently pour in the tonic water. Add ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.
Add the vodka to a highball glass with ice. Top with soda water. Stir. Garnish with a lime wedge.
Build the vodka, cranberry juice and grapefruit juice in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with an orange swath and cherry.
Add the vodka citron, triple sec and lemon juice to a shaker tin. Add ice and shake. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass with a sugar rim.
Add the pineapple juice, grenadine, maraschino and light rum to a shaker tin. Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled champagne coupe.
Add all ingredients to a shaker tin. Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and maraschino cherry.
Add the bourbon, simple syrup and lemon juice to a shaker tin. Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled lowball glass filled with ice. Float the red win on top. Garnish with a lemon swath and cherry.
Add all ingredients (except soda water) to a shaker tin. Shake with ice. Strain into a collins glass. Top with soda water.
Add all the ingredients to a shaker tin. Shake with ice. Strain into an lowball glass with ice.
Stir all the ingredients with ice. Strain into a nick & nora glass. Top with champagne. Garnish with floating cranberries.
recipes.notes: Skip the simply syrup if the cranberry juice already contains added sugar.

recipes.method: Shake all the ingredients with ice. Strain into a nick & nora glass. Garnish with a raspberry.
Shake all the ingredients with cracked ice. Strain into chilled champagne coupe. Garnish with an edible orchid.
